pullRequest.title: Adjust test to not fail for insufficient Docker perms OKAPI-823

commit.message: Adjust test to not fail for insufficient Docker perms OKAPI-823
use context.assert a bit more; AssumeTrue for skip

nodes.bodyText: Can you remove this line or tweak it? It failed on one of our ec2 box because "Platform" does not exist. The actual result is {"Version":"17.06.2-ce","ApiVersion":"1.30","MinAPIVersion":"1.12","GitCommit":"402dd4a/17.06.2-ce","GoVersion":"go1.8.3","Os":"linux","Arch":"amd64","KernelVersion":"4.14.94-89.73.amzn2.x86_64","BuildTime":"2017-11-14T22:04:39.163310834+00:00"}
It seems dh.deleteUrl and dh.postUrlJson can be tested independently. Is there a reason to chain them?

commit.message: Test for Docker version property that should always exist
